function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of quantity in technological advancements for medical field during pandemic outbreaks","Impact":"Reduced capacity to handle a large number of patients, leading to overwhelming of healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Investment in scaling up production of medical equipment and aids, and development of rapid manufacturing technologies","Technologies":"Rapid prototyping, 3D printing, industrial automation","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, general public","Owner":"Medical equipment manufacturers, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Challenges in tight isolation and containment of COVID-19 patients","Impact":"Increased spread of the virus, difficulty in controlling the outbreak","Mitigation":"Enhanced surveillance and monitoring systems, development of effective isolation technologies and protocols","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, IoT-based patient monitoring, isolation pods","People":"COVID-19 patients, healthcare workers, general public","Owner":"Healthcare providers, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Need for interdisciplinary collaboration in handling the crisis","Impact":"Inadequate response to the crisis, lack of holistic solutions","Mitigation":"Integration of expertise from multiple fields, establishment of interdisciplinary task forces and research groups","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, collaborative work software, data analytics tools","People":"Medical professionals, social scientists, engineers, psychologists, social workers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, research organizations"}]}
